about_the_game:
Bring your favorite bachelors home with this Deluxe Pack that includes a digital art book and wallpapers to decorate your PC and your phone!

Deluxe Pack Includes:
- Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms "Character Art Collection" Digital Art Book
- Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms "Event Scene Collection" Digital Art Book
- PC Wallpapers
- Mobile Wallpapers

The Deluxe Pack contents will be downloaded into your steamapps > common > Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms > data > dlc > Deluxe Edition folder.
